column2: Can switch to any random ruler.
Excludes Emperors and Kings from the roulette.
Excludes Emperors, Kings and Dukes from the roulette.
Excludes people who have an heir not of their dynasty
§RYou might have an old person unable to produce an heir!§!
Young (age<35) males and patrilineally married females won't be available.
People with regencies won't be excluded from the roulette.
Child (age<16) regencies will be excluded from the roulette.
Excludes all regencies from the search.
You can choose the number of years to fire the roulette on.
Welcome to Roulette Kings! This mod allows you to randomize to a new ruler upon your chosen integer of time.\n\nMod by Striped_ on Discord(/ECVXJPgAjK) and Youtube.
I'll stay with what I've chosen.
Choose the time it will take for every roulette.
Your time is up and you can now choose to switch to your new random ruler or stay where you are now!
§YYou'll be given another chance the next time§!
Spin the wheel and switch over to a new ruler early.
Counts will be excluded from Roulette search.
